original_title: "Superman Can't Kill People" - A Kryptonian Epic Short
overview: "Clark... how do YOU feel about what happened?"  Trapped into a surprise confrontation with Lex Luthor's "Suicide Squad", Clark Kent found himself battling world- class assassins in a burning building filled with civilians, as the National Guard steadily approached. Reacting in the moment, Clark Kent offered Floyd Lawton, the squad's leader, multiple chances to surrender. But after Lawton refused, and plunged the situation into chaos, "Superman" terminated the entire team, one by one. One night later, Lois Lane, Clark's longtime girlfriend, and Pete Ross, his closest friend, had a somewhat awkward dinner at Lois' apartment. This is what was said.
title: "Superman Can't Kill People" - A Kryptonian Epic Short
